title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 146 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 146 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。我的心哪，你要赞美耶和华。

lineList.en: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
lineList.cn: 我一生要赞美耶和华。我还活的时候要歌颂我的神。

lineList.en: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
lineList.cn: 你们不要倚靠君王，不要倚靠世人。他一点不能帮助。

lineList.en: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
lineList.cn: 他的气一断，就归回尘土。他所打算的，当日就消灭了。

lineList.en: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:
lineList.cn: 以雅各的神为帮助，仰望耶和华他神的，这人便为有福。

lineList.en: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:
lineList.cn: 耶和华造天，地，海，和其中的万物。他守诚实，直到永远。

lineList.en: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:
lineList.cn: 他为受屈的伸冤，赐食物与饥饿的。耶和华释放被囚的。

lineList.en: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:
lineList.cn: 耶和华开了瞎子的眼睛。耶和华扶起被压下的人。耶和华喜爱义人。

lineList.en: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
lineList.cn: 耶和华保护寄居的，扶持孤儿和寡妇，却使恶人的道路弯曲。

lineList.en: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 耶和华要作王，直到永远。锡安哪，你的神要作王，直到万代。你们要赞美耶和华。
